articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Egyptian Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and  conversed with Moustafa Mohamed Ahmed Al Hatter, Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
